body_html:
It’s described in “Numerical Optimization”, second edition (Jorge Nocedal, Stephen J. Wright), World Scientific, 2006. (page 178)
s_k := x_{k+1} - x_k, refers to the step between previous iterates (defined on page 177)
body_text:
It’s described in “Numerical Optimization”, second edition (Jorge Nocedal, Stephen J. Wright), World Scientific, 2006. (page 178)
s_k := x_{k+1} - x_k, refers to the step between previous iterates (defined on page 177)
body:
It’s described in “Numerical Optimization”, second edition (Jorge Nocedal, Stephen J. Wright), World Scientific, 2006. (page 178)
`s_k := x_{k+1} - x_k`, refers to the step between previous iterates (defined on page 177)
